bibl.title: Group of Mask-Animal Gems from the Collection of Constantine Schmidt-Ciążyński.
bibl.note: The collection of Constantine Schimdt-Ciążyński (1818-1889), since 1886 part of the Kraków National Museum collection, contains as much as 45 so-called mask-animal gems, in the past also known as grylloi.

bibl.title: Études et Travaux (Studia i Prace). Travaux du Centre d'archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie Polonaise des Sciences

bibl.seg: Joachim Śliwa, Group of Mask-Animal Gems from the Collection of Constantine Schmidt-Ciążyński.

The collection of Constantine Schimdt-Ciążyński (1818-1889), since 1886 part of the Kraków National Museum collection, contains as much as 45 so-called mask-animal gems, in the past also known as grylloi.
